root.name: Talisman
root.description: Based on the Games Workshop board game of the same name. In 2007, Capcom employed the developer Big Rooster in order to release a downloadable video game. It was to be made available on XBLA and PSN. A PC version was also to be released. Unfortunately, undisclosed problems were encountered that ultimately prevented Capcom from releasing the game. Capcom's Senior Director of Strategic Planning and Research, , stated that after a misfire at the start of the project, moving it to other developers would probably cost more than the revenue it would generate. As of 2008, rights reverted back to Games Workshop.
